title: Betty Gilpin Is Fascinated By The "Actress On Talk Show" Trope
description:
Acclaimed actress Betty Gilpin tells Stephen about the many things that go through her mind as she watches fellow entertainers sit for talk show interviews. Betty's new book of essays, "All the Women in My Brain: And Other Concerns," is available everywhere now.
